ClassDesc: Fields for accessing colors available for a given account. Colors are referenced by @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#ColorsColumns#COLOR_KEY_E@ which must be unique for a given account name/type. These values can only be updated by the sync adapter. Only @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#ColorsColumns#COLOR_E@ may be updated after the initial insert. In addition, a row can only be deleted once all references to that color have been removed from the @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#Calendars_E@ or @B_android#provider#CalendarContract#Events_E@ tables.
